video.title: Play with Me Sesame
video.synopsis: Ernie, Bert and Grover invite kids to play games, sing and dance with their favorite "Sesame Street" characters, in an interactive play-date format.

episodes.synopsis: Ernie teaches kids about up and down, Zoe gets kids dancing, Cookie Monster gets a computer cookie, and Bert draws with his oatmeal.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Ernie plays an animal sounds game, Kermit visits Old MacDonald's farm, Bert plays the Perfect Pair game, and Grover gets kids dancing like animals.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Grover leads an exercise video, Asking Elmo asks about dog training, Bert teaches about patterns, and Grover and Ernie get everyone jumping.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Ernie and the gang have fun with books and discover the magic of writing tools, Grover teaches about surprises, and Bert learns about air.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Ernie, Elmo and the gang teach kids about emotions, Bert plays Perfect Pair, Prairie Dawn takes Cookie Monster on a hike, and Grover sings.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Rubber Ducky leads Ernie Says, Grover conducts emotional music, Elmo finds computers in the library and school, and everyone plays a matching game.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Cookie Monster paints, Bert plays Perfect Pair, Zoe and Cookie Monster play find the cookie, and Grover sings "Twinkle, Twinkle, Little Star."
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: The whole gang plays Ernie Says, Grover makes Elmo feel better, Sesame Street sports are played, Bert plays Pigeon Patterns, and Ernie and Elmo sing.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: The Sesame gang learn about parts of the body as they play Ernie Says and What's Prairie's Problem, Super Grover comes to the rescue, and Ernie sings.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Learn about shapes and patterns when Grover frames pictures. Bert plays with pigeons, and Prairie Dawn interviews Little Red Riding Hood and the Wolf.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Big Bird and Zoe show the difference between big and little, Grover delivers a singing telegram, Prairie Dawn interviews Rapunzel, and everyone sings.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Grover goes on safari, Bert plays Perfect Pair, Ernie talks about big and small, and different animals sing "Happy Birthday."
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Bert pretends to be a pigeon and plays Pigeon Patterns, Prairie Dawn and Elmo report from space, and Cookie Monster draws.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Ernie plays Duckie Says and gets a drawing lesson, Cookie Monster learns to control his temper, and Bert and Ernie use their imaginations.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Ernie and Bert practice emotions, Frazzle goes to the dentist, Cookie Monster teaches about inside and outside, and the girls sing about girl power.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Big Bird takes a nap, Elmo and Telly have a sleepover, Bert plays Perfect Pair, the gang sings about getting rest, and Ernie dances himself to sleep.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Ernie and the gang play Ernie Says, Cookie Monster teaches about the mouth, Prairie Dawn directs Singin' in the Rain, and Grover gets kids grooving.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Ernie Says covers body parts, Bert draws with his oatmeal, Elmo and Prairie Dawn play a duet, Cookie Monster raps, and animals visit Ernie.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Grover sells hot dogs, Bert feeds the pigeons, Prairie Dawn blindfolds Cookie Monster, Elmo sings about sharing, and Grover sings the "Wubba" song.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Ernie Says focuses on animals, Grover becomes a waiter, Prairie Dawn teaches Cookie Monster about patterns, and Ernie takes a bath.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Cookie Monster stops an argument, Grover takes the stage, Bert creates oatmeal art, everyone teaches about opposites, and Grover goes driving.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Big Bird gives a lesson about opening doors, Grover helps Kermit with his hair, and Ernie and Bert play the "Guess the Emotion" game.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Ernie Says turns into Rubber Ducky Says, Elmo plays Zoe Says, Grover becomes a flight attendant, and Prairie Dawn takes Cookie Monster hiking.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: "Ernie Says" pretend to sleep, Elmo learns the parts of the face, Grover sells suits, Cookie Monster goes disco and Ernie plays the drums.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: "Ernie Says" has fun with sounds, Zoe and Cookie Monster play "Near and Far," Grover sings about sharing and Bert and Ernie use their imaginations.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Ernie Says covers emotions, Grover serves spaghetti, Bert plays Pigeon Pattern, Prairie Dawn has a trash can adventure and Bert counts singing sheep.
episodes.title: Episode 26
